title: Top 10 B.Tech in Data Science Courses to Take Up in India - Analytics Insight
content: Top 10 B.Tech in Data Science Courses to Take Up in India  Analytics Insight
description: Data science is an essential part of many industries today, given the massive amounts of data that are produced, and is one of the most debated topics in IT circles. Here are the career options for top 10 B.Tech in Data science courses that are available in India.
